dependencies.description:
Minimap2 is a versatile sequence alignment program that aligns DNA or
mRNA sequences against a large reference database. Mappy provides a
convenient interface to minimap2.
dependencies.name: minimap2

dependencies.description:
A distributed collaborative effort to develop Python libraries and
applications which address the needs of current and future work in
bioinformatics.
dependencies.name: py-biopython

dependencies.description:
GFF and GTF file manipulation and interconversion gffutils is a Python
package for working with and manipulating the GFF and GTF format files
typically used for genomic annotations. Files are loaded into a sqlite3
database, allowing much more complex manipulation of hierarchical
features (e.g., genes, transcripts, and exons) than is possible with
plain-text methods alone.
dependencies.name: py-gffutils

dependencies.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.
dependencies.name: py-networkx

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description:
Python Bindings for the Parasail C Library. Parasail is a SIMD C (C99)
library containing implementations of the Smith-Waterman (local),
Needleman-Wunsch (global), and semi-global pairwise sequence alignment
algorithms.
dependencies.name: py-parasail

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: pyfaidx: efficient pythonic random access to fasta subsequences
dependencies.name: py-pyfaidx

dependencies.description: A python module for reading, manipulating and writing genomic data sets.
dependencies.name: py-pysam

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: Ultra fast JSON decoder and encoder written in C with Python bindings.
dependencies.name: py-ujson

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
Liftoff is a tool that accurately maps annotations in GFF or GTF between
assemblies of the same, or closely-related species.
name: liftoff

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
